reviews.review: Another one of those games that is a fitting sequel. I like it. Play the first one and then your free to know all the story line bonuses. I really like the boss as well. Also the Mods are sweet. Getting to play other people's puzzles is a lot of fun. The challenges are another favorite but you will get tired of them fast. Switch it up and hours of fun at your fingertips. I think this is a good brain game.

hayatımda oynadığım en yaratıcı oyun kesinlikle. Portal 2 ile başladım ama Portal'ı da kesin oynayacağım :) Senaryo, diyaloglar, grafikleri bulmacalar her ne varsa hepsi müthiş. Herkese gözü kapalı almalarını tavsiye ederim. Türkçe altyazı desteğide olması çok ayrı bir güzellik.

Easily in my top 10 of best PC games of all time, Portal 2 has everything that made the first game popular and expanded it:
Great story that leaves you wanting to know more, well thought puzzles with new mechanics, local or online multiplayer, atmospheric music (I'm talking big bucket movie quality here)... It also has new characters and a good voice acting with funny dialog lines.
Packed with secrets/easter eggs and beautiful environments, this game will catch you more than a space core shaped pokéball. Damn you Valve, you made it again!

Un jeu très intelligent avec une très bonne campagne solo (je n'ai pas encore fait la campagne en coop). Si vous chercher un jeu qui sort de l'ordinaire, n'hésitez pas à prendre ce portal 2. La campagne est assez courte par contre mais vous avez à votre disposition l'éditeur de stages et les créations des autres joueurs (que je vais tester de ce pas :) )
Best puzzle game ive ever played by my favorite game company, Valve.

Ich liebe dieses Spiel! ^^ Storytechnisch empfehle ich den 1. Teil zuerst durchzuspielen, dann ist die Geschichte diesen Teiles noch lustiger! Ebenso sollte Singleplayer vor dem Multiplayer gespielt werden.
Die Steuerung empfinde ich deutlich verbessert zum Vorgänger.

Die Spieldauer des Singleplayer ist etwa doppelt so lang wie im ersten Teil. Ich brauchte rund 8 Stunden. Die Rätsel hier sind ebenfalls anspruchsvoller. Diesmal wird nicht nur Logik oder auch etwas Physik gefragt ^^

Sehr empfehlenswert ist auf jeden Fall der Coop-Modus! Entweder Splitscreen oder LAN / Online.

Zur Story kann ich sagen, dass man in einer Forschungseinrichtung erwacht, und versucht zu entkommen, indem man verschiedene Logikrätsel löst, durch die einen eine nette Computerstimme begleitet. 

Mir gefällt besonders, dass hier mittig des Spiels die Geschichte hinter Aperture Science (also der Forschungseinrichtung) geschildert wird. Wann es entstand und wie es sich entwickelte. Aufmerksames zuhören steigert definitiv den Witz! Darauf folgte dann Portal Teil 1. Also der Anfang von Portal 2 sowie das Ende spielen geschichtlich nach Portal 1. 

Quasi ein MUSS für jeden, der den 1. Teil gespielt hat und sich fragt, wer zur Hölle GLaDOS entwickelt hat und wer hinter den Testkammern steckt, und warum Teil 1 geschichtlich so war, wie es war ^^
Finished this very quickly, but haven't tried the co-op. About ten hours for single player campaign.
Awesome game with a really good storyline, though it could be longer. I still can't believe I befriend a potato and that turrets make fantastic choirs.

Великолепная игра! Одна из не многих игр, которую прошел всю на одном дыхании, некоторое время не нравилось, что игра такая долгая. Замечательно выполненные уровни, красивая и не требовательная к железу графика, в общем приятная, добрая игра. Когда наступает завершение игры, не хочется, чтобы она кончалась. После начала финальных титров на душе стало немножко грустно, что игра завершена. Достойное продолжение 1 части. Разработчики молодцы!
If you like learning, thinking, or portals, this is the game for you.
Continuación de Portal más que recomendable, mucho puzles más y mucho más humor y mucho más GlaDos.

Ótima sequência do melhor jogo de puzzle já feito, Portal 2 só mostrou a evolução da série, com puzzles mais desafiadores, uma campanha maior e superior à do primeiro título e um excelente "plot twist" logo de cara. GLaDOS continua sendo uma das melhores vilãs já feitas. Extremamente recomendado, está no meu TOP 3 de jogos da Valve. E lembre-se: SPAAAAACE!

Tuve la suerte de jugar Portal hace un montón de tiempo y ahora después de tanto me enfrento a este Portal 2. No sé cómo conseguí evitar los spoilers pero aquí estoy. Es un juego imprescindible. Uno de los pocos elegidos en el olimpo. Una compra obligatoria. Un viaje necesario. Una obra maestra. Una maravilla.
Świetna gra, jedna z najbardziej innowacyjnych w pierwszym dziesięcioleciu XXI w. z humorem, który powoduje, że nie można jej nie polubić.
Тпшнулся в игруху нормальную!

Difficoltà dei rompicapo e longevità.
Come sempre un finale che scalda il cuore. Bisogna giocarlo per capire.
Well, this game is amazing.

After finishing Portal and starting Portal 2, you might think it's just an expansion of the same type of levels as you were used to in the original game (I thought so at first). This would've been good already, since portal one had very good and interesting puzzles already. But the way the plot develops on the way.. It's amazing! As much fun as it is to solve the puzzles, it's the storyline and the characters that excelled most in this game, however simple it may seem!

Pros:
- Very entertaining puzzling gameplay
- Witty, funny and great voice acting
- This storyline and plot, wow
- Has hilarious warning signs
- Has a talking potato
- WHEATLEY
- Has more pros that I cant name without spoiling anything :D
- Had a surprise for me at the end :3

Cons:
- WHY ISNT THERE MORE OF THIS
- Too difficult to think of serious downsides

So, did you enjoy Portal? You HAVE to play Portal 2.
Did you not? REGARDLESS, you HAVE to play Portal 2. 
Some chapter names and voicelines by themselves are worth the entire playthrough already.
Rating: 10/10

I am speechless with this game. How do I rate one of the best series in games I've ever played? Really. Its that good. Describe Mario. I mean really. Outside of saying he's a goomba murdering, turtle killing, psychotic plumber, brain washed by some crazy blonde who has it out for world domination (seriously go watch you tube on mushroom kingdom conspiracies.) How do you describe in words such a great game. Some times the only way to do it justice is to play it.

PROS:
-Everything. 
-The engine does the game justice
-The game makes you think and have fun while doing it.
-The story line is good and funny at times.
-Watching the next level of interactivity with destruction of the labs and watching as rooms are pulled apart and smashed together really immerses the player. Well done!
-You can make portals.

CONS:
-Nudity but...the only nudity you see is a half naked drone robot (like from the first Portal). It is missing a panel or two and all I can see is the circuitry.
-Robot nudity (mentioned above) does not contain a lap dance.

[b]Portal 2[/b] - гра в жанрі головоломки від першого лиця. Суть гри полягає у проходженні тестових кімнат за допомогою спеціального приладу - портальної пушки.

[h1] Плюси гри: [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Чудова механіка гри й гарна графіка
    [*]Захоплюючий і непередбачуваний сюжет  
    [*]Різноманіітність головоломок
    [*]Цікавий гумор від Гладос та пасхалки від розробників
    [*]Епічна кінцівка й сюрприз в кінці гри 
    [*]Надзвичайний кооператив на двох
    [*]Можливість створення своїх рівнів та проходження рівнів створених спільнотою
[/list] 

[h1] Мінуси гри: [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Єдиний мінус який я зміг накопати - це те, що після проходження гри хочеться продовження. На жаль, ми його побачимо тоді, коли й Half life 3
 [/list]

Отже, це (на мою скромну думку) найкраща гра в своєму жанрі і одна з кращих ігор в які я грав у своєму житті.
Як сказав дядько Гейб:
[quote=Gabe Newell] О, Portal 2 просто неперевершена! Це наша найкраща гра! [/quote]

Оцінка: 10 клятих штучних інтелектів із 10

Portal 2 is easily one of the best games of this console generation. It's not quite as good as Portal, but it is definitely worth your time. The difference between Portal and Portal 2 is that Portal was a stellar puzzle game with a stellar framework, but Portal 2 is a story that begrudgingly has a puzle game in it. For example, the death mechanic here puts more time between you and what you were doing before. It's still a fantastic puzzle game, and new mechanics like gels and lasers form around the main portal mechanic like fluffed sugar around a stick in a cotton candy machine. And let me tell you, it's delicious cotton candy.
The best thing to set up your brains to defend from the morronity of the outer world)))

それなりに健康な肉体とピザが買える程度の小銭を持つ諸君、Apature Scienceによる
人類の未来のための有意義な科学実験に参加しよう！

実験に参加するメリット？
与えられたテストの進行に応じた実績が与えられる！
本編をクリアしたらチャレンジやＣＯＯＰモードの他、
ワークショップで新たなマップをダウンロードして挑戦して
永遠に楽しいテストに挑戦することができるのだ。

昨日までPortal2をウィッシュリストに入れて、カートに入れて、
買おうかどうしようかと思い悩んでいた時間よりは
有意義な時間を過ごせるだろう。

で、今の諸君らにそれ以上のメリットが必要かね？

プレイ中に３Ｄ酔いする可能性と君の財布から定価で20ドルくらい失われるというデメリットがあるが、
Valveのピザ代を捻出するという有意義な目的の前では
許容可能な損失だ。

説明が最後になったが、参加表明した後の辞退は一切受け付けていない。
では実験を始めよう。

Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

This is a puzzle game.


[h1]Interface/Menu/Settings[/h1]

There is a master volume slidebar available.
There is a music volume slidebar available.
There is a brightness volume slidebar available.
There are many resolution sizes available.
You can toggle between fullscreen, windowed mode or borderless window.
You are able to play this game local or online co-op.
You can change the splitscreen to vertical or horizontal.
You are able to change the controls on your keyboard and mouse.
There is a mouse sensitivity slidebar available.
You are able to play this with your controller.
You are able to change the sensitivity speed on your slidebar.
You can toggle the rumble effect on your controller.
There is level editor available and you are able to publish this to the workshop.
Single player and Co-op has a different story.

[h1]About the game.[/h1]

Like in Portal 1, you will be carrying a portal gun to travel between area's or even completing certain area's by making portals. Objects and yourself are able to go through these portals which could be a challenge to complete certain levels. Sometimes you or an object will have to make a portal that will let you bounce or fly to a higher platform or make your own passages as things could get blocked off. You will have to move a companion cube to a switch to open and trigger things. Cubes are also able to go through these portals but will get destroyed if they touch a blue force field or fall into a hazard environment. You will have to reach the end of the level in order to move to the next area.


Requires braincells.
Has deep dark jokes.
There are collectables.
Good puzzles.
Has ingame options.
Alt-tabbing is not your friend once you are in a fullscreen game.
There are subtitles and they are voiced over.
There are small hints at some levels.

[h1]Other things.[/h1]

None.

-------------------

You see, I had my doubts. My friends told me about this game, and I shrugged it off. I didn't really think of it as significant, and I told them I had played the flash version, which was essentially the same thing.

That's where I was wrong.

You see, Portal 2 isn't your typical game. Sure, there's new items, funny storyline, and chell, Glados, and Wheatley, but behind that, there's a story. A good story. One that makes you think. This could actually happen in real life, and that's the freaky part many people don't think about. You get to know each character, from Glados, to the companion cube. They all have a fell to them, how they fit into the world around them. And that's why I give this 10/10.
one of the best coop games out there ! Campaign good and funny too! totally worth our money ! 10/10
